name: netlify-mcp-server
title: Netlify
summary: Deploy, secure, and manage websites with Netlify
description:
Some key functionalities include:

- Creating, managing, and deploying Netlify projects
- Configuring access controls and permissions
- Fetching user and team information
- Enabling and managing form submissions
- Creating environment variables and secrets

Typical scenarios where it's used:

- Speeding up development workflows by letting AI agents handle deploys and configuration changes
- Automating repetitive project setup and management tasks
- Managing multi-project environments across teams with consistent access controls
- Integrating Netlify deployment workflows directly into editors like VS Code, Windsurf, Cursor, or Claude

In short, the Netlify MCP Server provides a standardized, secure way for AI-driven development tools to extend Netlify's full functionality into your daily development environment.
